body:
I have an ordered list (ol) on my page but the numbering is not showing up at all! I have done this:
  1. my text
  2. my text
  3. my text
As I have typed the above, stackoverflow was able to render it correctly the way I wanted it to, like so: 1. my text 2. my text 3. my text However, this is not happening on my webpage. I am viewing this in Firefox on my localhost. If any knows why my ol's look like ul's (i.e. no numbering) I would be grateful for help. If not, please let me know how I can achieve a numbered list using ul's. Thanks all
title: Ordered List (ol) showing up un-numbered?
